attr.title: The Legend of Zelda: Zeldo's Challenge 2
attr.desc: After having touched the Trophy of Victory won at the end of the first chapterâ€™s dungeon, Link is teleported in High-rule, a parallel world where multiple video games universes are mixed up. Link must go to the Tower of Memories where Zeldo is waiting for him to get his revenge!
attr.inst: Download the game from https://solarus-games.org/games/defi-de-zeldo-ch-2/ and put in the ports/zeldoschallenge2 folder.
